title: Learner-Centered Scientific Job Training Curriculum for Corporate Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher practical experience in science and fundamental LMS (Learning Management System) utilization skills
context.additional_context: Applying customized learning strategies to strengthen job relevance and develop soft skills for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can apply five core soft skills (collaboration, problem-solving, communication, flexibility, leadership) required in corporate science fields to real-world tasks.
Learners can plan and execute two or more practical projects per quarter through self-directed learning via an LMS.
Learners can measure and improve competency development outcomes at least once monthly using peer feedback and mentoring systems.

resources: Science domain job competency case database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
